//About Page About This app was made as a senior project for Dr. Stonedahls CSC490 class at Augustana College in Rock Island Illinois Kevin Phoenix Kevin is a senior at Augustana College Majoring in Computer Science. When he is not coding he enjoys playing guitar and riding tractors. Dylan Hart Dylan is a senior at Augustana College Majoring in Computer Science. When he is not coding he enjoys playing baseball and playing rocket league. Max McComb Max is a senior at Augustana College Majoring in Computer Science. When he is not coding Max enjoys playing Basketball, and listening to Kevin play guitar. Scott Daluga Scott is a senior at Augustana College majoring in Computer Science and minoring in Math. He enjoys playing tennis and hanging out with his four siblings in his free time.
